metadata.title: RZ/V2M: How about Micron LPDDR4 Memory Connection Results?

sections.content:
Question:
Can we use 4GByte LPDDR4 "MT53E1G32D2FW-046 WT:A" provided by Micron?
Answer:
The connection for MT53E1G32D2FW-046 WT:A is checked by Renesas.
If you want to use the EVK software as it is, make the pin connections the same as for EVK.
When you want to swap the pin, please refer to the documentation and Application Note, and modify it by yourself.
Suitable Products
RZ/V2M
Can we use 4GByte LPDDR4 "MT53E1G32D2FW-046 WT:A" provided by Micron?
